hybridAbilitiesDescription:
Hybrid abilities are special abilities that require both Martial prowess and Spellcasting knowledge to learn and master. To be able to learn a hybrid ability, the following requirements must be met.
  • You must meet the requirements of the ability.
  • You must be able to lern spells of the Disciple of the Hybrid Ability.
  • You must be able to learn one additional Combat maneuver and Spell.
When you learn a Hybrid Ability it takes up one Martial Combat Maneuver and one Spell that you canâ€™t learn instead. As such there is no limit for the amount of Hybrid Abilities you can learn as it strongly depends on your Martial and Spellcasting Capacity.
